name: Rent A Smile
overview:
Rent A Smile (http://www.rentasmile.com) is a brand new virtual personal assistant service remotely handling obnoxious and time consuming daily activities.

When hiring a personal assistant, itâ€™s important to know they can handle tasks both large and small. Offering to take on almost all of your loathsome responsibilities no matter the size, Rent A Smile claims their ultimate goal is simply to â€œmake your life betterâ€, so…they also make ice cream?! Requestable services start with â€œpersonalâ€ favors (avail in monthly packages of 30 or 50 at “a dollar a task”), which cover everything from organizing travel, to booking appointments, to ordering groceries, to even â€œreading bedtime stories to your children over the phoneâ€, but hopefully not “Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Dad Who Pays Others to Read His Kids Bedtime Stories Over the Phone”. If you need something more Herculean, they also offer to tackle â€œProjectsâ€, with past examples including organizing an extended vacation for a group of 20+ people, planning an entire wedding, and dealing with all aspects of throwing a bday party, from the location, to the decorator, to the entertainment (though if they screw up, you’ll be the one looking like a clown).

If you’re no pleasure and all business, they’ll even complete office-related tasks from researching to spreadsheet-making, saving you from having to one day say “Honey, I Blew Up the Business”.

Give it a shot with the free 7-day trial at http://www.RentASmile.com
